messages.title: Standing up for what really matters
messages.content: I am asking for your vote to represent you in the Scottish Parliament. The Tories are back and Scotland needs a Labour Government fighting for our people. If elected, I will work to protect jobs and services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are now two ways to support the Tories in this seat - by voting Tory, or by voting Lib Dem. But there's only one way to beat the Lib Dems AND to protest against the Cameron/Clegg government - by voting Labour.

images.caption: Elect Paul GODZIK Scottish Labour and Co-operative Thursday 5 May
